title: How Red, White & Royal Blue Builds a Warm, Escapist Rom-Com
description: The film adaptation of Casey McQuiston's beloved 2019 novel straddles fantasy and real-world problems in a young, queer fairy tale.

title: Attorney General Appoints a Special Counsel in the Hunter Biden Probe
description: Merrick Garland announced he has appointed a special counsel in the Hunter Biden probe, deepening the investigation of the president's son.

description: Doctors have doubts.

description: The country has spent billions recruiting the sports biggest names, including Cristiano Ronaldo, as another season kicks off Friday.

title: Netflix’s Heart of Stone Is a Mission: Impossible Wannabe That Mostly Misses
description: It occupies that vast middle zone of small-screen movies that easily fill the void of a few empty hours, if you happen to have any to spare, though it’s nothing you’d carve out time in your schedule to watch.

title: In Defense of Suits
description: The ludicrous legal procedural deserves to be on top of Netflix's streaming charts.

title: Judge Warns of Limits to What Trump Can Say About Election Case
description: The judge in the election conspiracy case against Trump agreed to limited protective order.

description: How director André Øvredal adapted a single chapter from Dracula' for his new horror film

description: Romances like 'Red, White, and Royal Blue' represent a dramatic shift in the fantasy lives of their mostly female audience.

title: Energy Department Announces Largest-Ever Investment in Carbon Removal
description: The U.S. government has announced an historic investment in two projects to directly remove carbon dioxide from the air.

description: The transfer marks a significant initial step in a tentative deal for the full release of Americans from Iran's prisons.

description: Six Colombian men were arrested in connection with the fatal shooting of presidential candidate Fernando Villavicencio in Quito.

title: Tensions Rise as West African Nations Prepare to Send Troops to Niger
description: Tensions are escalating between Niger's new military regime and the West African regional bloc over the deployment of troops to restore democracy.

description: Earthlings will get a dazzling view of the year's brightest meteor shower from Aug. 11 to Aug. 13. Here's what to know.

title: How India’s Bulldozers Became a Vehicle of Injustice

title: The Case Against AI Everything, Everywhere, All at Once

title: New Zealand Accuses China, Russia, and Iran of Attempting Foreign Interference
description: Most notable, New Zealand’s Security Intelligence Service found, is the continued targeting of ethnic Chinese communities by groups and individuals linked to the People’s Republic of China.

title: Dr. Bernice A. King Reflects on Her Father’s ‘Blueprint’ for Change

description: From speeches by Dr. Bernice A. King and Stacey Abrams to performances by Bebe Winans and J. Ivy, here’s what happened at TIME’s Honoring the March: An Impact Family Dinner.
